      spacecrypto-bot---This is a free python bot program that crosses you to farm with auto click in space crypto NFT game, having fun :)

libevent /

      libevent---Event notification library

littlefs-project /

      littlefs---A little fail-safe filesystem designed for microcontrollers

swisskyrepo /

      PayloadsAllTheThings---A list of useful payloads and bypass for Web Application Security and Pentest/CTF

BishopFox /

      unredacter---Never ever ever use pixelation as a redaction technique

supabase /

      supabase---The open source Firebase alternative. Follow to stay updated about our public Beta.

      harmonoid---🎵 Elegant music app to play & manage music library. Lyrics & playlists. YouTube support.

openai /

      gym---A toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms.

withfig /

      autocomplete---Fig adds autocomplete to your terminal.

openvinotoolkit /

      anomalib---An anomaly detection library comprising state-of-the-art algorithms and features such as experiment management, hyper-parameter optimization, and edge inference.

odin-lang /

      Odin---Odin Programming Language

google /

      googletest---GoogleTest - Google Testing and Mocking Framework

beurtschipper /

      Depix---Recovers passwords from pixelized screenshots

metowolf /

      vCards---📡️ vCards 中国黄页 - 优化 iOS/Android 来电、信息界面体验

neovim /

      neovim---Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability

NVlabs /

      instant-ngp---Instant neural graphics primitives: lightning fast NeRF and more

spring-projects /

      spring-petclinic---A sample Spring-based application

trustwallet /

      assets---A comprehensive, up-to-date collection of information about several thousands (!) of crypto tokens.
